property.name: democontrol.install.dir
property.description: Directory under which demo control utility will be installed

property.name: democontrol.device.manager.git.url
property.description: Online location to download Device Manager Application

property.name: democontrol.sam.extentions.git.url
property.description: Online location to download SAM custom extentions

property.name: democontrol.simulator.git.url
property.description: Online location to download Simulator package

property.name: democontrol.google.api.key
property.description: Google API Key used to enable Map in Device Manager UI
